Name: Le Minuit
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Absinthe based but incredibly subtle. Absinthe combines wonderfully with wine and apple.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2001 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, Knightsbridge, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Le Minuit contains 112 calories
